EmailTemplate.name: HS Baseline Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Please fill in this survey before HeadStart London Kick Off
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart | The Challenge
We are so excited about you joining HeadStart.
Before attending the Kick Off you need to complete this survey. If you have any problems please contact us.
Here's a reminder of the Kick Off details:
When: Wednesday 23rd July 12:45pm-4pm Where: City Hall, The Queen's Walk, London, SE1 2AA. About 10min walk from London Bridge station and 15 from Tower Hill. City Hall is on the south bank of the Thames. Look for the distinctive curved glass building. RSVP: headstart@the-challenge.org
We look forward to seeing you at Kick Off!
headstart@the-challenge.org www.the-challenge.org/headstart
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Â© The Challenge Network.
